verses.verse: וַֽעֲתַלְיָה֙ <WH6271> va-'a-tal-Yah And when Athaliah אֵ֣ם <WH517> 'em the mother אֲחַזְיָ֔הוּ <WH274> 'a-chaz-Ya-hu, of Ahaziah; וּרָאֲתָה u-ra-'a-tah כרָאֲתָ֖ה <WH7200> ra-'a-Tah advise self קכִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for מֵ֣ת <WH4191> met was dead בְּנָ֑הּ <WH1121> be-Nah; that her son וַתָּ֙קָם֙ <WH6965> vat-Ta-kom she arose וַתְּאַבֵּ֔ד <WH6> vat-te-'ab-Bed, and destroyed אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all זֶ֥רַע <WH2233> Ze-ra' all the seed הַמַּמְלָכָֽה׃ <WH4467> ham-mam-la-Chah. royal

וַתִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> vat-tik-Kach took יְהוֹשֶׁ֣בַע <WH3089> ye-ho-She-va' But Jehosheba בַּת־ <WH1323> bat- the daughter הַמֶּֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech- of king י֠וֹרָם <WH3141> Yo-rom Joram אֲח֨וֹת <WH269> a-Chot sister אֲחַזְיָ֜הוּ <WH274> 'a-chaz-Ya-hu of Ahaziah אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יוֹאָ֣שׁ <WH3101> yo-'Ash Joash בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֲחַזְיָ֗ה <WH274> 'a-chaz-Yah, of Ahaziah וַתִּגְנֹ֤ב <WH1589> vat-tig-No and stole אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> o-To מִתּ֤וֹךְ <WH8432> mit-Toch him from among בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- sons הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech the king's; הַמַּמֹותְתִים ham-ma-mot-tim כהַמּ֣וּמָתִ֔ים <WH4191> ham-Mu-ma-Tim, put קאֹת֥וֹ <WH853> o-To וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מֵינִקְתּ֖וֹ <WH3243> mei-nik-To him [even] him and his nurse בַּחֲדַ֣ר <WH2315> ba-cha-Dar chamber הַמִּטּ֑וֹת <WH4296> ham-mit-Tot; bed וַיַּסְתִּ֧רוּ <WH5641> vai-yas-Ti-ru and they hid אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> o-To מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei from עֲתַלְיָ֖הוּ <WH6271> 'a-tal-Ya-hu Athaliah וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo were being הוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> hu-Mat. [which were] slain

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> vay-Hi become אִתָּהּ֙ <WH854> 'it-Tah her in בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit in the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD מִתְחַבֵּ֖א <WH2244> mit-chab-Be And he was with her hid שֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8337> shesh six שָׁנִ֑ים <WH8141> sha-Nim; years וַעֲתַלְיָ֖ה <WH6271> va-'a-tal-Yah And Athaliah מֹלֶ֥כֶת <WH4427> mo-Le-chet did reign עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. over the land פ Peh

וּבַשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> u-vash-sha-Nah year הַ֠שְּׁבִיעִית <WH7637> Hash-she-vi-'it And the seventh שָׁלַ֨ח <WH7971> sha-Lach sent יְהוֹיָדָ֜ע <WH3077> ye-ho-ya-Da' Jehoiada וַיִּקַּ֣ח׀ <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach and fetched אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> sa-Rei the rulers; הַמֵּאיֹות ham-me-yot כהַמֵּאֹ֗ות <WH3967> ham-me-'ot, hundred קלַכָּרִי֙ <WH3746> lak-ka-Ri with the captains וְלָ֣רָצִ֔ים <WH7323> ve-La-ra-Tzim, and the guard וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> vai-ya-Ve and brought אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> 'o-Tam אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> 'e-Lav to בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit them to him into the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD וַיִּכְרֹת֩ <WH3772> vai-yich-Rot and made לָהֶ֨ם <WH1992> la-Hem like בְּרִ֜ית <WH1285> be-Rit a covenant וַיַּשְׁבַּ֤ע <WH7650> vai-yash-Ba' with them and took an oath אֹתָם֙ <WH854> 'o-Tam in בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> be-Veit of them in the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> vai-Yar and shewed אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> 'o-Tam אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- son הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech. them the king's

וַיְצַוֵּ֣ם <WH6680> vay-tzav-Vem And he commanded לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, them saying זֶ֥ה <WH2088> zeh This הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> had-da-Var This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher you תַּעֲשׂ֑וּן <WH6213> ta-'a-Sun; that ye shall do הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֤ית <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shit A third part מִכֶּם֙ <WH4480> mik-Kem who בָּאֵ֣י <WH935> ba-'Ei of you that enter in הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <WH7676> hash-shab-Bat, on the sabbath וְשֹׁ֣מְרֵ֔י <WH8104> ve-Sho-me-Rei, shall even be keepers מִשְׁמֶ֖רֶת <WH4931> mish-Me-ret of the watch בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit house הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech. of the king's

וּשְׁתֵּ֤י <WH8147> u-she-Tei And two הַיָּדוֹת֙ <WH3027> hai-ya-dOt parts בָּכֶ֔ם ba-Chem, כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> kol of you all יֹצְאֵ֣י <WH3318> yo-tze-'Ei of all you that go forth הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <WH7676> hash-shab-Bat; on the sabbath וְשָֽׁמְר֛וּ <WH8104> ve-sha-me-Ru even they shall keep אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִשְׁמֶ֥רֶת <WH4931> mish-Me-ret the watch בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- of the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech. the king

Treason ס sa-Mek
